# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates an activity indicator from data in an unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Parameters

- **coder**: An unarchiver object.

## Creating an activity indicator

- **init(style:)**: Creates an activity indicator.
- **init(frame:)**: Creates an activity indicator with the specified frame rectangle.
